title: Camera shutter sound and screenshot sounds can't be disabled (no option)
content: I've read the standard answer about countries restrictions and the workaround by booting the phone without the SIM card. The workaround doesn't work, and I can't find the list of the countries in which Google thinks there can be law restrictions for it. There is no such law in my country for sure and other phones can disable shutter sound and screenshot sound (and other system sounds).
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
